arts.ttl: Haway The Podcast | REACTION | Sunderland Win 4-0 Away At South Shields!
arts.sum: Join Gav and Jonny as they react to Sunderland’s first game of pre-season away at South Shields FC! All of this and more - subscribe to Haway The Podcast so you never miss another episode!

arts.ttl: Andy’s Player Ratings: South Shields 0-4 Sunderland — Lads get off to a winning start!
arts.sum: A busy display down the right wing, worked hard off the ball and set up Diarra for a good shot at goal and then had a header himself that went narrowly wide from a Mundle cross. Goals from Wilson Isidor, Romaine Mundle, Milan Aleksic & Ahmed Abdullahi got Sunderland off to a winning start in pre-season with a comfortable victory away at South Shields.
